definition: completely, exactly vertical, the metal bob of a plumb line, adjust with a plumb line so as to make vertical
details:
adverb
- completely
= synonyms: plum, clean, right, all the way, from start to finish, clear, sublimely, stark
- exactly
= example: exactly
= synonyms: plum, right, flop
- conforming to the direction of a plumb line
adjective
- exactly vertical
= example: exactly vertical
noun
- the metal bob of a plumb line
= synonyms: plumb bob, plummet
verb
- adjust with a plumb line so as to make vertical
- examine thoroughly and in great depth
- measure the depth of something
- weight with lead
